description: A tender cut of beef from the narrow front part of the tenderloin.
Tender cut of meat from the short loin section, features heavy marbling.
A cut of beef from the primal rib, one of the nine primal cuts of beef.
A triangular shaped cut at the tip of the sirloin, extremely flavorful and tender.
Sits at the top of the rib primal, the part of the cow between the chuck and the loin.
Cut from the junction of the tenderloin and top loin, it delivers a mouthwatering combination of filet mignon New York strip.
